results.name: Numbers with at least three adjacent equal digits in binary representation.
comment: Complement of A063037; union of A004779 and A004781.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
mathematica: Select[Range[150],SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[#,2],{x_,x_,x_}]>0&] (* Requires Mathematica version 10 or later *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 04 2020 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 11 2007
